text: læa xallxh thrng hı bangkeid sing mi chiwit thuk chnid cak na dangnan nı hmu phwk man man ca kheluxn yay dwy thxng khxng man læa nı hmu phwk man man ca dein dwy thæ a thang si læa nı hmu phwk man man ca dein dwy thea thang si xallxh thrng bangkeid sing thi phraxngkh thrng prasngkh thæcring xallxh nan thrng xanuphaph henux thuk sing
